alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued March 31 at 3:01PM CDT until March 31 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR THE WESTERN AND CENTRAL PANHANDLES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Texas and Beaver. In Texas... Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb...Hartley... Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Oldham...Potter... Carson...Gray...Wheeler...Deaf Smith...Randall...Armstrong... Donley...Collingsworth and Palo Duro Canyon. * 20 Foot Winds...West 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...Today, 6 to 8. * Timing...Today 9 AM through 10 PM.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
